snippet: The Obama administration has discovered a number of defects in the online marketplace that will offer health insurance to small-business employees, but said they would be fixed before Nov. 15.
abstract: Obama administration has discovered defects in online marketplace that will offer health insurance to millions of small-business employees; federal officials say problems could probably be fixed before website goes live in November.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration has discovered a number of defects in the online marketplace that will offer health insurance to small-business employees, but said they would be fixed before Nov. 15.

headline.main: Defects Found Before Debut of Health Insurance Site for Small Businesses
headline.print_headline: Defects Found Before Debut of Health Insurance Site for Small Businesses

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
